content.rendered:
About us

Fitnesstrendz is dedicated to the coverage of Health Fitness and Lifestyle. Fitnesstrendz.in is a participant in the Amazon Services LLC Associates Program, an affiliate advertising program designed to provide a means for site to earn advertising fees by advertising and linking to amazon.com Additionally, Fitnesstrendz.in participates in various other programs, and we sometimes get a commission through a purchase made through our links.

@graph.name: Deepak Shukla
@graph.description: Hi, My name is Deepak Shukla and I am an ACE Certified Personal Trainer and a Gym owner with a passion of bodybuilding. The reason behind this website is to provide the right information absolutely free to those who really want a healthy lifestyle. All the Exercises, Diets and Products on this website are 100% tested on my clients. So, help me grow this health and fitness family and be a part of it. If you have any fitness related query so you can ask by clicking contact us option #stay_healthy :)
